column1: Funeral services will be at 2:00pm Friday
column4: at First Church of the Nazarene in Orange with a visitation starting at 1:00. Officiating will be Reverend Ray McDowell
column5: of First Church of the Nazarene in Orange and Revered Barry Bradley
column6: of First Baptist Church in Orange. Entombment will follow at Hillcrest Memorial Gardens with military honors by Southeast Texas Veterans Group.  Visitation will be from 5:00pm-8:00pm
column10: at Claybar Funeral Home in Orange.
